Class TensorFactory

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.mathematics.linearalgebra.tensors.TensorFactory
public class TensorFactory extends Object
Factory for creating tensors using pluggable providers.

Automatically discovers tensor providers via Java SPI.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

    Storage format for tensors.

    • getProvider

      public static TensorProvider getProvider()
      Returns the current tensor provider from LinearAlgebraRegistry.
      Returns:
      the provider

    • getProvider

      public static TensorProvider getProvider(String name)
      Returns a provider by name.
      Parameters:
      name - the provider name (e.g., "Native", "ND4J")
      Returns:
      the provider
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if provider not found

    • getAllProviders

      public static List<TensorProvider> getAllProviders()
      Returns all available providers.
      Returns:
      list of providers

      Parameters:

      shape - the tensor shape
